review: I LOVE my Chromecast.  I use it to stream my online video lectures from my tablet, phone, or computer to the TV for better viewing of my classes.  Nice screensaver pics prevent screen burnout, and the resolution is fabulous on our 55" HDTV.  Also works great for Pandora, Netflix, and Hulu.I've had mine since January 2014, and I haven't had any problems with the device.  I do wish that it could remember more than one network at a time, since I take this traveling with me frequently (works great on hotel TVs, but you have to provide a login network, so I usually set up a wifi hotspot).  Maybe that's by design, or maybe that will come with the next generation.Finally, I put this to the "granny" test.  My mother has blinking 12:00 on all of her household appliances and is generally uncomfortable with new technology.  She was able to set it up herself and get it working with her iPhone, which means that it is not a complicated technology to use.
